title: Lamia
description: Rescued from a life of solitude and damnation by her wealthy Uncle, Lamia is thrown into a Victorian society full of decadence and debauchery. Where her vampiric nature is awakened and her blood lust becomes urgent and all consuming. We follow Lamia over the centuries to the present day, where she manages to find a life of somewhat normalcy, then suddenly her world is thrown once again into chaos and depravity by the hands of her Uncle. Her life becomes a dangerous spiral of sex, violence and a thirst not only for blood but also survival. Shocking and raw, Lamia strips back vampire clichés and exposes a vampire culture fueled by power, cults and BDSM.Lamia is a no holds barred exposé into the world of real life vampires. It follows the life of Lamia, a female vampire tangled up in a web of deceit and depravity.THERE IS NO SALVATION - ONLY BLOOD.
author: Destiny West
